While gt is a great #rstats pkg for making tables, you may want to go the extra mile and make a statistical summary table. For that: gtsummary! An awesome package that extends gt to stratospheric heights. The RStudio Education Blog has the deets: https://t.co/XF49Vv5QBO.
Mapping a quantitative trait via variable edge widths of a plotted tree is now a function in #phytools, & it has some cool-looking options: https://t.co/8a0pV1i4xW. #rstats https://t.co/zToI4sImsq
